title: Ugly image scaling issue

comments.body: Agreed. But need to weigh up cost between quality and performance. The fact that you can popup a full size image of a card alleviates this issue somewhat. The biggest issue with poor quality of thumbnails IMHO is that the card name is ineligible. Could possibly look at adding overlay like in Forge.
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body: Out of curiosity: why would using a better image scaling algorithm have a significant performance impact? scaling images in real time on a basic machine is almost possible, nowadays. Furthermore, scaled card images could be calculated quickly on the fly and cached, no?
